item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series! This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant, event and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is:

Ladder 133 Sports Bar and Grill in Smith Hill ( http://ladder133.com/)

Details:

#1 Notre Dame takes on #2 Alabama in the BCS National Championship game! Abby is Providence's #1 Alabama fan and is super pumped to watch this game!

Ladder 133 is always wonderful to us.  Abby has reserved the stage are for our group, which will include 2 flat screens and one GIANT drop down screen as well as designated  cocktail servers so you don't have to fight the crowd at the bar!  Separate checks can be handled as well, of course!

The game does not start until 8:30 p.m. with (significant) coverage starting around 7:30 p.m. I'm guessing.

 

Hope to see you there!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome... Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the crazy Alabama fan wearing crimson, white, and houndstooth. We have the stage area with big screen reserved. Ask hostess for "crazy Alabama fan"
item.name: Monday Night Meetup - Ladder 133 (for BCS National Championship!)
